resources.string: Click the above text for more information

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Cica-daun Besar atau Cucak Hijau, dikenal dengan warna hijau terang dan suara merdu.
Merpati karang, burung yang sering ditemukan di area urban dan suka berkelompok.
Magpie Robin, burung hitam dan putih dengan ekor panjang yang sering dijumpai di Asia.
Jalak Bali, burung endemik Bali dengan bulu putih dan pelupuk mata biru.
Gelatik Jawa, burung kecil populer sebagai peliharaan dengan bulu indah.
Gagak, burung besar dan cerdas dengan bulu hitam, sering dijumpai di seluruh dunia.

resources.string: As an informatics student and mobile development enthusiast, I have a passion for creating beautiful and functional apps for users. I write code primarily in Kotlin, which is a popular programming language for Android development. My focus is on creating visually appealing and intuitive user experiences that make using the app a pleasure.
Identify bird species effortlessly by either capturing a photo with your camera or selecting an existing image from your gallery
Always bring binoculars for a closer look.
Learn to identify common bird behaviors and sounds.
Carry a field guide to help identify birds.
Familiarize yourself with common bird calls.
Bird watching requires patience and quiet observation.
Wear suitable clothing for the environment and weather.
Utilize birding apps and online resources for assistance.
Pay attention to how birds fly and move.
Connect with local bird watchers for tips and outings.
Launch the bird detection app from your home screen or app drawer.
Select the upload option to choose a bird image from your gallery.
Tap the camera icon to take a photo of a bird directly within the app.
Wait for the app to analyze the image and identify the bird species.
View the bird species name and additional information provided by the app.
Save the identified bird to your personal birding journal within the app.
